00021 require 'content_list.inc.php';

00034 class detail extends content_list
00035 {
00036     private $obj_db = false;
00037     private $record_detail = array();
00038     private $detail_id = 0;
00039     private $error = false;
00040     private $output_format = 'html';
00041     protected $detail_prefix = '';
00042     protected $detail_suffix = '';
00043     public $record_title;
00044     public $metadata;
00045 
00054     public function __construct($obj_db, $int_detail_id, $str_output_format = 'html')
00055     {
00056         if (!in_array($str_output_format, array('html', 'xml', 'mods'))) {
00057             $this->output_format = trim($str_output_format);
00058         } else { $this->output_format = $str_output_format; }
00059 
00060         $this->obj_db = $obj_db;
00061         $this->detail_id = $int_detail_id;
00062         $_sql = 'SELECT b.*, l.language_name, p.publisher_name, pl.place_name AS \'publish_place\', gmd.gmd_name, fr.frequency FROM biblio AS b
00063             LEFT JOIN mst_gmd AS gmd ON b.gmd_id=gmd.gmd_id
00064             LEFT JOIN mst_language AS l ON b.language_id=l.language_id
00065             LEFT JOIN mst_publisher AS p ON b.publisher_id=p.publisher_id
00066             LEFT JOIN mst_place AS pl ON b.publish_place_id=pl.place_id
00067             LEFT JOIN mst_frequency AS fr ON b.frequency_id=fr.frequency_id
00068             WHERE biblio_id='.$int_detail_id;
00069         // for debugging purpose only
00070         // die($_sql);
00071         // query the data to database
00072         $_det_q = $obj_db->query($_sql);
00073         if ($obj_db->error) {
00074             $this->error = true;
00075         } else {
00076             $this->record_detail = $_det_q->fetch_assoc();
00077             // free the memory
00078             $_det_q->free_result();
00079         }
00080     }
00081 
00082 
00088     public function showDetail()
00089     {
00090         if ($this->error) {
00091             return '<div style="padding: 5px; margin: 3px; border: 1px dotted #FF0000; color: #FF0000;">Error Fetching data for record detail</div>';
00092         } else {
00093             if ($this->output_format == 'html' AND !empty($this->list_template)) {
00094                 return parent::parseListTemplate($this->htmlOutput());
00095             } else if ($this->output_format == 'mods') {
00096                 return $this->MODSoutput();
00097             } else {
00098                 // external output function
00099                 if (function_exists($this->output_format)) {
00100                     $_ext_func = $this->output_format;
00101                     return $_ext_func();
00102                 }
00103                 return null;
00104             }
00105         }
00106     }
00107

00114     protected function htmlOutput()
00115     {
00116         // get global configuration vars array
00117         global $sysconf;
00118 
00119         foreach ($this->record_detail as $idx => $data) {
00120             $data = trim(strip_tags($data));
00121             if ($idx == 'notes') {
00122                 $data = nl2br($data);
00123             }
00124             $this->record_detail[$idx] = $data;
00125         }
00126 
00127         // get title and set it to public record_title property
00128         $this->record_title = $this->record_detail['title'];
00129         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Title" content="'.$this->record_title.'" />';
00130         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Edition" content="'.$this->record_detail['edition'].'" />';
00131         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Call Number" content="'.$this->record_detail['call_number'].'" />';
00132         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="ISBN/ISSN" content="'.$this->record_detail['isbn_issn'].'" />';
00133         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Classification" content="'.$this->record_detail['classification'].'" />';
00134         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Series Title" content="'.$this->record_detail['series_title'].'" />';
00135         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Media" content="'.$this->record_detail['gmd_name'].'" />';
00136         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Language" content="'.$this->record_detail['language_name'].'" />';
00137         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Publisher" content="'.$this->record_detail['publisher_name'].'" />';
00138         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Publish Year" content="'.$this->record_detail['publish_year'].'" />';
00139         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Publish Place" content="'.$this->record_detail['publish_place'].'" />';
00140         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Physical Description" content="'.$this->record_detail['collation'].'" />';
00141         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Notes" content="'.$this->record_detail['notes'].'" />';
00142 
00143         // check image
00144         if (!empty($this->record_detail['image'])) {
00145             $this->record_detail['image'] = '<img src="./lib/phpthumb/phpThumb.php?src=../../images/docs/'.urlencode($this->record_detail['image']).'&w=200" border="0" />';
00146         } else {
00147             $this->record_detail['image'] = '<img src="./'.$sysconf['template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['template']['theme'].'/image.png" border="0" />';
00148         }
00149 
00150         // get the authors data
00151         $_biblio_authors_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT author_name FROM mst_author AS a'
00152             .' LEFT JOIN biblio_author AS ba ON a.author_id=ba.author_id WHERE ba.biblio_id='.$this->detail_id);
00153         $authors = '';
00154         // authors for metadata
00155         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="Authors" content="';
00156         while ($data = $_biblio_authors_q->fetch_row()) {
00157             $authors .= '<a href="?author='.urlencode('"'.$data[0].'"').'&search=Search" title="'.__('Click to view others documents with this author').'">'.$data[0]."</a><br />";
00158             $this->metadata .= $data[0].'; ';
00159         }
00160         $this->metadata .= '" />';
00161         $this->record_detail['authors'] = $authors;
00162         // free memory
00163         $_biblio_authors_q->free_result();
00164 
00165         // get the topics data
00166         $_biblio_topics_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT topic FROM mst_topic AS a
00167             LEFT JOIN biblio_topic AS ba ON a.topic_id=ba.topic_id WHERE ba.biblio_id='.$this->detail_id);
00168         $topics = '';
00169         $this->metadata .= '<meta name="topics" content="';
00170         while ($data = $_biblio_topics_q->fetch_row()) {
00171             $topics .= '<a href="?subject='.urlencode('"'.$data[0].'"').'&search=Search" title="'.__('Click to view others documents with this subject').'">'.$data[0]."</a><br />";
00172             $this->metadata .= $data[0].'; ';
00173         }
00174         $this->metadata .= '" />';
00175         $this->record_detail['subjects'] = $topics;
00176         // free memory
00177         $_biblio_topics_q->free_result();
00178 
00179         // availability
00180         $this->record_detail['availability'] = '<div id="itemListLoad">LOADING LIST...</div>';
00181         $this->record_detail['availability'] .= '<script type="text/javascript">new Ajax.Updater(\'itemListLoad\', \''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'lib/contents/item_list.php\', {method: \'post\', parameters: \'id='.$this->detail_id.'&ajaxsec_user='.$sysconf['ajaxsec_user'].'&ajaxsec_passwd='.$sysconf['ajaxsec_passwd'].'\'});</script>';
00182 
00183         // attachments
00184         $this->record_detail['file_att'] = '<div id="attachListLoad">LOADING LIST...</div>';
00185         $this->record_detail['file_att'] .= '<script type="text/javascript">new Ajax.Updater(\'attachListLoad\', \''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'lib/contents/attachment_list.php\', {method: \'post\', parameters: \'id='.$this->detail_id.'&ajaxsec_user='.$sysconf['ajaxsec_user'].'&ajaxsec_passwd='.$sysconf['ajaxsec_passwd'].'\'});</script>';
00186 
00187         // get location data
00188         $_item_loc_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT loc.location_name, COUNT(i.location_id) AS item_num FROM item AS i
00189             LEFT JOIN mst_location AS loc ON i.location_id=loc.location_id
00190             WHERE i.biblio_id='.$this->detail_id.' GROUP BY i.location_id');
00191         if ($_item_loc_q->num_rows < 1) {
00192             $this->record_detail['location'] = '<strong style="color: red; font-weight: bold;">'.__('There is no item/copy for this title yet').'</strong>';
00193         } else {
00194             $this->record_detail['location'] = '';
00195             while ($_item_loc_d = $_item_loc_q->fetch_row()) {
00196                 $this->record_detail['location'] .= '<strong>'.$_item_loc_d[1].' </strong> '.__('copies at').' <strong>'.$_item_loc_d[0].'</strong><br />'; //mfc
00197             }
00198         }
00199 
00200         $this->record_detail['notes'] = nl2br(strip_tags($this->record_detail['notes']));
00201         return $this->record_detail;
00202     }

00204 
00210     protected function MODSoutput()
00211     {
00212         // get global configuration vars array
00213         global $sysconf;
00214 
00215         // set prefix and suffix
00216         $this->detail_prefix = '<modsCollection xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/mods/v3 http://www.loc.gov/standards/mods/v3/mods-3-3.xsd">'."\n";
00217         $this->detail_suffix = '</modsCollection>';
00218 
00219         $_xml_output = '<mods ID="'.$this->detail_id.'" version="3.3">'."\n";
00220 
00221         // parse title
00222         $_title_sub = '';
00223         $_title_statement_resp = '';
00224         if (stripos($this->record_detail['title'], ':') !== false) {
00225             $_title_main = trim(substr_replace($this->record_detail['title'], '', stripos($this->record_detail['title'], ':')+1));
00226             $_title_sub = trim(substr_replace($this->record_detail['title'], '', 0, stripos($this->record_detail['title'], ':')+1));
00227         } else if (stripos($this->record_detail['title'], '/') !== false) {
00228             $_title_statement_resp = trim(substr_replace($this->record_detail['title'], '', stripos($this->record_detail['title'], '/')+1));
00229         } else {
00230             $_title_main = trim($this->record_detail['title']);
00231         }
00232 
00233         $_xml_output .= '<titleInfo>'."\n".'<title>'.$_title_main.'</title>'."\n";
00234         if ($_title_sub) {
00235             $_xml_output .= '<subTitle>'.$_title_sub.'</subTitle>'."\n";
00236         }
00237         $_xml_output .= '</titleInfo>'."\n";
00238 
00239         // personal name
00240         // get the authors data
00241         $_biblio_authors_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT a.*,ba.level FROM mst_author AS a'
00242             .' LEFT JOIN biblio_author AS ba ON a.author_id=ba.author_id WHERE ba.biblio_id='.$this->detail_id);
00243         while ($_auth_d = $_biblio_authors_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00244             $_xml_output .= '<name type="'.$sysconf['authority_type'][$_auth_d['authority_type']].'" authority="'.$_auth_d['auth_list'].'">'."\n"
00245               .'<namePart>'.$_auth_d['author_name'].'</namePart>'."\n"
00246               .'<role><roleTerm type="text">'.$sysconf['authority_level'][$_auth_d['level']].'</roleTerm></role>'."\n"
00247             .'</name>'."\n";
00248         }
00249         $_biblio_authors_q->free_result();
00250 
00251         // resources type
00252         $_xml_output .= '<typeOfResource manuscript="yes" collection="yes">mixed material</typeOfResource>'."\n";
00253 
00254         // gmd
00255         $_xml_output .= '<genre authority="marcgt">bibliography</genre>'."\n";
00256 
00257         // imprint/publication data
00258         $_xml_output .= '<originInfo>'."\n";
00259         $_xml_output .= '<place><placeTerm type="text">'.$this->record_detail['publish_place'].'</placeTerm></place>'."\n"
00260           .'<publisher>'.$this->record_detail['publisher_name'].'</publisher>'."\n"
00261           .'<dateIssued>'.$this->record_detail['publish_year'].'</dateIssued>'."\n";
00262         if ((integer)$this->record_detail['frequency_id'] > 0) {
00263             $_xml_output .= '<issuance>continuing</issuance>'."\n";
00264             $_xml_output .= '<frequency>'.$this->record_detail['frequency'].'</frequency>'."\n";
00265         } else {
00266             $_xml_output .= '<issuance>monographic</issuance>'."\n";
00267         }
00268         $_xml_output .= '<edition>'.$this->record_detail['edition'].'</edition>'."\n";
00269         $_xml_output .= '</originInfo>'."\n";
00270 
00271         // language
00272         $_xml_output .= '<language>'."\n";
00273         $_xml_output .= '<languageTerm type="code">'.$this->record_detail['language_id'].'</languageTerm>'."\n";
00274         $_xml_output .= '<languageTerm type="text">'.$this->record_detail['language_name'].'</languageTerm>'."\n";
00275         $_xml_output .= '</language>'."\n";
00276 
00277         // Physical Description/Collation
00278         $_xml_output .= '<physicalDescription>'."\n";
00279         $_xml_output .= '<form authority="gmd">'.$this->record_detail['gmd_name'].'</form>'."\n";
00280         $_xml_output .= '<extent>'.$this->record_detail['collation'].'</extent>'."\n";
00281         $_xml_output .= '</physicalDescription>'."\n";
00282 
00283         // Series title
00284         if ($this->record_detail['series_title']) {
00285             $_xml_output .= '<relatedItem type="series">'."\n";
00286             $_xml_output .= '<titleInfo>'."\n";
00287             $_xml_output .= '<title>'.$this->record_detail['series_title'].'</title>'."\n";
00288             $_xml_output .= '</titleInfo>'."\n";
00289             $_xml_output .= '</relatedItem>'."\n";
00290         }
00291 
00292         // Note
00293         $_xml_output .= '<note>'.$this->record_detail['notes'].'</note>'."\n";
00294         if ($_title_statement_resp) {
00295             $_xml_output .= '<note type="statement of responsibility">'.$_title_statement_resp.'</note>';
00296         }
00297 
00298         // subject/topic
00299         $_biblio_topics_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT t.topic, t.topic_type, t.auth_list, bt.level FROM mst_topic AS t
00300             LEFT JOIN biblio_topic AS bt ON t.topic_id=bt.topic_id WHERE bt.biblio_id='.$this->detail_id.' ORDER BY t.auth_list');
00301         while ($_topic_d = $_biblio_topics_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00302             $_subject_type = strtolower($sysconf['subject_type'][$_topic_d['topic_type']]);
00303             $_xml_output .= '<subject authority="'.$_topic_d['auth_list'].'">';
00304             $_xml_output .= '<'.$_subject_type.'>'.$_topic_d['topic'].'</'.$_subject_type.'>';
00305             $_xml_output .= '</subject>'."\n";
00306         }
00307 
00308         // classification
00309         $_xml_output .= '<classification>'.$this->record_detail['classification'].'</classification>';
00310 
00311         // ISBN/ISSN
00312         $_xml_output .= '<identifier type="isbn">'.str_replace(array('-', ' '), '', $this->record_detail['isbn_issn']).'</identifier>';
00313 
00314         // Location and Copies information
00315         $_xml_output .= '<location>'."\n";
00316         $_xml_output .= '<physicalLocation>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' '.$sysconf['library_subname'].'</physicalLocation>'."\n";
00317         $_xml_output .= '<shelfLocator>'.$this->record_detail['call_number'].'</shelfLocator>'."\n";
00318         $_copy_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT i.item_code, i.call_number, stat.item_status_name, loc.location_name, stat.rules, i.site FROM item AS i '
00319             .'LEFT JOIN mst_item_status AS stat ON i.item_status_id=stat.item_status_id '
00320             .'LEFT JOIN mst_location AS loc ON i.location_id=loc.location_id '
00321             .'WHERE i.biblio_id='.$this->detail_id);
00322         if ($_copy_q->num_rows > 0) {
00323             $_xml_output .= '<holdingSimple>'."\n";
00324             while ($_copy_d = $_copy_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00325                 $_xml_output .= '<copyInformation>'."\n";
00326                 $_xml_output .= '<numerationAndChronology type="1">'.$_copy_d['item_code'].'</numerationAndChronology>'."\n";
00327                 $_xml_output .= '<sublocation>'.$_copy_d['location_name'].( $_copy_d['site']?' ('.$_copy_d['site'].')':'' ).'</sublocation>'."\n";
00328                 $_xml_output .= '<shelfLocator>'.$_copy_d['call_number'].'</shelfLocator>'."\n";
00329                 $_xml_output .= '</copyInformation>'."\n";
00330             }
00331             $_xml_output .= '</holdingSimple>'."\n";
00332         }
00333         $_xml_output .= '</location>'."\n";
00334 
00335         // record info
00336         $_xml_output .= '<recordInfo>'."\n";
00337         $_xml_output .= '<recordIdentifier>'.$this->detail_id.'</recordIdentifier>'."\n";
00338         $_xml_output .= '<recordCreationDate encoding="w3cdtf">'.$this->record_detail['input_date'].'</recordCreationDate>'."\n";
00339         $_xml_output .= '<recordChangeDate encoding="w3cdtf">'.$this->record_detail['last_update'].'</recordChangeDate>'."\n";
00340         $_xml_output .= '<recordOrigin>machine generated</recordOrigin>'."\n";
00341         $_xml_output .= '</recordInfo>';
00342 
00343         $_xml_output .= '</mods>';
00344 
00345         return $_xml_output;
00346     }
00347 
00348 
00352     public function getPrefix()
00353     {
00354         return $this->detail_prefix;
00355     }
00356 
00357 
00361     public function getSuffix()
00362     {
00363         return $this->detail_suffix;
00364     }
